snippet: Mr. Perry is an enthusiastic supporter of oil and gas extraction, but the Energy Department is far more focused on national security and basic science....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump plans to name former Texas Gov Rick Perry to lead Energy Dept, agency far more concerned with national security and basic science than extraction of fossil fuels that is Perry’s expertise; it remains unclear how Perry's experience will translate to department he once said he wanted to eliminate.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Perry is an enthusiastic supporter of oil and gas extraction, but the Energy Department is far more focused on national security and basic science.

headline.main: Rick Perry, Ex-Governor of Texas, Is Trump’s Pick as Energy Secretary
headline.print_headline: Perry Is Chosen as Energy Chief
